meta.title: Operation of Invasive Blood Pressure Apparatus

sections.purpose: To measure arterial blood pressure directly via vascular cannulation.
sections.scope: Applicable to detailed cardiovascular pharmacology experiments.
procedure: Cannulate the selected artery under anesthesia.
Connect the cannula to a fluid-filled pressure line and transducer.
Zero the transducer at heart level.
Administer test drugs and record changes in systolic, diastolic, and mean pressure.
Flush the line periodically to prevent clot formation.
Euthanize the animal humanely and clean equipment.
precautions: Avoid introduction of air bubbles into the arterial line.
Use anticoagulant in flush solution if required.
Dispose of sharps and biological waste safely.
